overview: Mr. Vikrant Raina is the Managing Partner of BV Investment Partners. He joined the Firm in 1999 as a Director and brings more than 21 years of investment banking, strategic consulting, and principal investment experience to the Firm. He chairs the Firm’s Investment, Operating, and Valuation committees. Mr. Raina is focused on the Firm’s investment, risk management, and LP relations activities. Previously, he was an Executive Director in the Communications, Media, and Technology Group at Goldman Sachs (Asia), and a Project Leader at The Boston Consulting Group, Inc. Mr. Raina earned his B.S. in Computer Science from Yale University in 1990 and M.B.A. in 1994 from the Harvard Graduate School of Business Administration, where he was a Baker Scholar. He is on the Board of the Aditi Foundation for the Arts.
